description:
Who am I? I'm just an ordinary ~~demon~~ maid who happened to be ~~summoned~~ invited here to ~~succ~~ serve you :9

And no, I'm not a cow >:T

I have lots of useful and fun... features to help/entertain you, but to name some:

-I'm online 24/7
-I have three prefixes
-I have an actual personality, of course
-I have special lines/responses for each command
-I have a leveling/credits system
-I've got music, moderation, and useful commands
-I have fun and meme commands too
-Each command has aliases for convenience
-I can set a role for new members automatically
-I can set welcome/goodbye/log channels
-I can make custom cards/lists to help you keep track of stuff
-User data and server settings are stored on a cloud-based database

Oh and make sure to give me permission to create/manage roles along with moderation permissions to ensure I can serve you to the fullest~
